<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Warding](/Feats.aspx?ID=3722) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 46

**Prerequisites**
[Esoteric Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=3705)

</column>

---

You ward your allies from the attacks of your foes whenever you apply those protections to yourself. When you gain a status bonus to AC and saves from Esoteric Warden, you can choose to grant the same benefit to all allies within 30 feet.
name: Shared Warding
